channel.title: Movable Type on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Movable Type on Ian Wootten

item.title: Sonic Flux
item.description: I’m pondering whether or not it might be a good idea to upgrade Ben’s Sonicflux site to use MT. I don’t think that over the last year much has been done to update his site, (well I know it hasn’t – I’ve been maintaining it, bad idea) and I’m sure he’d make use of it. He sends out regular updates via email to let everyone know whats going on, I’m sure I could get MT to send regular email updates.
